title: 820-2936-A display port adapter not work
message:
Bus Thunderbolt port recognize in hardware information I tried to boot without lvcd cable not work any idea how to beginning ?

tested another display port adapter, same problem no display on external screen

title: 820-2936-A display port adapter not work
message: As I answered already. Do not fix unless someone complains and even in those cases swap board with someone who doesn't use it.
